title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text:
Here is the summary of the article about Patient-Reported Outcomes (PROs) in healthcare, formatted as requested:

**KEY FINDING**: Older adults with **transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy** showed significant improvements in quality of life using **ePROs**, reducing hospital readmissions by **40%**.
**TACTICAL WIN**: [SHIP NOW] Implement ePRO solutions for real-time symptom tracking to enhance patient adherence and outcomes.
